title: General Hydroponics MaxiBloom for Gardening, 2.2-Pound
feature: MaxiGro and Maxi Bloom are stand-alone, water-soluble, dry concentrated nutrients
MaxiGro and Maxi Bloom will provide superior results when used with a wide variety of crops in all hydroponic, soil or soil-based growing environments
Use to encourage growth of seedlings and cuttings and to stimulate rapid growth through the vegetative growth stage
description: Maxi Bloom are extremely potent, stand-alone, water-soluble, dry concentrate nutrients. Complete in Primary, Secondary and Micro Nutrients, pH-buffered . Maxi Bloom will provide superior results when used with a wide variety of crops in both hydroponic and soil-based environments. Use Maxi Bloom for the reproductive stage in fast-growing annuals. Maxi Bloom encourages prolific flowering and fruiting and increases yields and crop quality.
